thread.title: blur Group appoints business mentor as non-executive director
thread.title_full: blur Group appoints business mentor as non-executive director | MENAFN.COM

author: ProactiveInvestors  UK
title: blur Group appoints business mentor as non-executive director
text: (MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors)blur Group (LON:BLUR) the Exeter-based enterprise services platform and marketplace has appointed business mentor Robert Wirszycz as a non-executive director. Philip Letts blur Group's chief executive said: "We are delighted to welcome Rob to blur Group's board as non-executive director where he will bring a wealth of invaluable software industry knowledge and experience. Wirszycz has an extensive background in enterprise outsourcing managed services software products and consumer electronics with strategy sales marketing and people development particular areas of expertise. He currently works as an adviser and mentor for a range of quoted and private businesses including Innovation Group and iForce. 'His appointment further strengthens our governance and reinforces blur Group's commitment to its Enterprise-focused strategy" Letts added.
